title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I create a new file f1.txt and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: When I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the open files that have been saved should be closed.
SR:
1. Download and install build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open the application.
3. Create a new file f1.txt.
4. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.
5. Verify that all the open files that have been saved are closed.
